dmca.title: Writer Wants Articles Removed from Google Groups (#5)
dmca.body:
September 24, 2004


Hello. This letter is to notify you that the copyright of my article "Queen Elizabeth I" has been infringed on Google Groups.

1. The copyrighted work which has been infringed is my article "Queen Elizabeth I," which is published on my website at www.royalty.nu

2. Google Groups member CT Guy 102 has copied the text of my article without my permission and published it on Google Groups at this message ID :

< 20040919155036.23728.00000806@mb-m12.aol.com >

3. My name is [private]. I can be contacted at: 
[private]
Crystal River, FL 34428
xxx-xxx-xxxx
e-mail [private]@yahoo.com

4. The infringement appears on Google Groups, alt.gossip.royalty newsgroup.

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

I'm sorry to have to continue complaining about this person who has repeatedly copied my articles and posted them on Google Groups. Thank you for all your help with this problem. Please remove my Queen Elizabeth I article from Google Groups. My signature is below.

7.
